original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Multiple areas in Colombo will experience a 16-hour water cut starting at 5 PM on Saturday, 13th January 2024.
The water supply will be suspended to Colombo 11, 12, 13, 14, and 15.
Navy arrest 02 suspects with 10,600 Pregabalin capsules in Talaimannar
Navy takes hold of 03 poaching trawlers in Sri Lankan waters
Justice Minister Eyes Kandakadu Management Revamp After Inmate Brawl Leaves 24 Hurt
